data.name: Portfolio

data.name: Movies app
data.description: App displaying a list of movies that may be liked, disliked, removed and filtered by type. A pagination feature enables to limit the amount of movies per page.

data.name: E-commerce
data.description: Fully responsive mobile-first bilingual e-commerce app consuming and processing API data. Using Redux Toolkit for state management and localStorage for saving preferences.
